item.title: Using Team Topologies to reorganize a consultant company
item.description: In the last year or so I have been involved in reorganizing the company where I work, Capra Consutling, based on the same prinicples as one would want to organize software development. In short, we had an organizations based on roles and hierarchies which made sense when we were no more than 50 employees. When we arived at 100 employees, it was natural to do some changes, but we did not want to add an extra layer of hierarchy.
